For the third year, The Arc is partnering with the Family Support Research and Training Center (FSRTC) at the University of Illinois at Chicago to organize coalitions that seek to improve support to families in their state. The Arc is offering $4,000 grants to state and local chapters of The Arc to organize state coalitions. See what the grant entails here. Don’t just take our word for it—here’s what Tony Anderson from The Arc of California had to say: “We’ve increased understanding between groups and started to lay out a path forward together for California caregivers in both communities.” Requests for proposals are due December 15, 2016. Apply today!
